LanguageData.JRWCarnotaurus.label: Carnotaurus
LanguageData.JRWCarnotaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03910-1985 [CARNOTAURUS SASTREI] CODENAME: BULL >23
A strange abelisaurids with short arms and two prognated horns above their eyes. They were incredibly powerful for the stature and size, and have been known to engage in cannibalism.
